title: One The Unity Song Lyrics by George Peter and Friends
stanzas:
By George Peter and Friends

With stars like Vikram, Sudeep, Mammootty, Mohanlal, Suresh Gopi, Vivek Oberoi, Zayed Khan, Asin, Karthika, Lakshmi Rai, Mamta and Bhavana; sport stars Saina Nehwal and Sreesanth as well as singers/instrumentalists Blaaze, Shwetha Mohan, Shankar Mahadevan, Vasundhara Das, KS Chitra, Usha Uthup, Ustad Ghulam Mustafa Khan and sons, K J Yesudas, Vikku Vinayakaram and Stephen Devassy to name a few.


Vikram  

how long ..
eppadu okkate
do we how 

Mamta

how long 
before we kill that pride
too hatred
no more human sacrifice


Full Song Lyrics Coming Soon
